US X Factor. The Price Of Beauty star took to her Twitter account this week to dismiss a recent rumour that she could join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of his upcoming Fox competition. Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) she wrote. Jessica Simpson is the latest in a string of celebrities to be linked to the show.
